dialogue.text: An unpleasant, bass voice came from a massive silhouette.
Trying to get a clearer look at the silhouette, he managed to make out small wings behind its back, fluttering rapidly, working hard to support the creature's enormous body.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Are you the tooth fairy? You look kind of strange...

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Just what I am, a regular tooth fairy.
